commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: rename chatbot from Duke to Katty
commitResults.messageBody:
- Rename Duke.java to Katty.java
- Update class name and all references
- Update base testcase

- Initial greeting and exit messages
- Add KattyExpression enum for visual variety
- Implement formatted ASCII cat response system

- Corrected indentation in Katty.java for better readability.
- Added explicit 'throws' clause to kattyMessage signature.

- Added Scanner for user commands. Echoes the same command back.
- "bye" command exits program, triggers farewell message.

- Tasks and TaskManager added
- Improved handling of user commands with the new task features.

- Tasks can now be marked as complete or incomplete.
- Tasks now have an internal state through objects.
- Implements operation result system to handle separation of concerns.
